attributes.action: Pay all MPs no more than the national minimum wage.
attributes.additional_details: For so long we have been told how we should be able to live on the national minimum wage by MPs who have no money worries, it's about time MPs came down to the same level as the working class.
attributes.background: Pay all active members of parliament no more than the national minimum wage, if you can't survive on the national minimum wage how do you expect everyone else to do the same.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:
http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
